coreAttributes.name: Dried Food
coreAttributes.description:
A set of small brown bags. Each bags either contains dried meats, dried fruits and nuts.
[style.italicsMinorGood(This item is deprecated, only severing for legacy purpose for older version "Food Box" supersede this.)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the knot that ties the bags and [npc.verb(grab)] a piece. Unable to resist the urge, [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] shoving pieces into [npc.her] mouth until the bags has been emptied.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the knot that ties the bags and [npc.verb(hold)] it out to [npc2.name], allowing [npc2.herHim] to ogle the varied assortment of dried cuts . Unable to resist the anticipation, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(start)] shoving pieces into [npc2.her] mouth until the bags has been emptied.
